examples.example: 我不小心丢了钥匙，但我相信一定能找回来的。

translate.english: I carelessly lost my key, but I believe I can definitely find it back.

examples.example: 我虽然丢了很重要的东西，但我相信通过努力一定能重新拥有。

translate.english: Although I have lost something very important, I believe that through hard work I will surely be able to regain it.

examples.example: 我在公园游玩时不小心丢了帽子，但我保持乐观相信一定能找到它。

translate.english: I carelessly lost my hat when playing in the park, but I remain optimistic and believe that I can definitely find it.
